From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron aproached the elevator, but was cut off by a noise from the
computer. "Commander, urgent message." it informed him. He turned, and
headed straight for the command center. He realised that during all the
chaos, two messages had elluded him.

He opened up the first one, to the IGL. 

"Greetings, I am Megatron, leader of the Decepticons. I request and
audience with you, personally." he inquired. He then turned to the
other, it was on a secret Decepticons line. Who possibly knew of it, a
Maximal trick, perhaps?

"He opened up a view screen, and attempted to connect with the D.E.D's.
(If it's not all right, then tell me, and I will rewrite.)

Megatron's face came to life on the screen, filling it up, as he looked
back, at Scrapper. "Scrapper? What are you doing?" he said, more
disturbed than anything.
